backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a DOM‑element‑reordering feature and its related files, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files including components, styling, config, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions with light/dark OKLCH palettes and global background/text setup.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML shell that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page rendering the love‑letter layout, hero photo, message, gallery, footer, and share‑link section with curtain overlay.
frontend/src/components/CurtainCuteAnima: Animated layer generating floating hearts, sparkles, and drifting particles with reduced‑motion fallback.
frontend/src/components/CurtainCuteEntra: Decorative entrance card with animated hearts, sparkles, and a stylized SVG heart that scales/fades during reveal.
frontend/src/components/CurtainEntranceO: Full‑screen entrance overlay handling reveal animation, reduced‑motion logic, click/keyboard activation, and completion timing.
frontend/src/components/CurtainStarSpark: Generates 25 animated star SVGs with varied positions, sizes, and Tailwind-driven animation classes for a sparkle overlay.
frontend/src/components/PolaroidCollageG: Displays a three‑photo polaroid collage with fallbacks, decorative elements, and a Valentine's Day message.
frontend/src/components/ShareLinkSection: Provides UI to view, copy, customize, and reset a shareable URL with validation and helpful alerts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, recreating it when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomShareUrl.ts: Manages a custom share URL stored in localStorage with validation, reset logic, and a computed active URL.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook handling login, stored identities, status flags, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus a romantic theme with custom OKLCH color variables, fonts, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom romantic color palette, fonts, shadows, and multiple heart-themed animations. Extends theme tokens and scans HTML/JS files for class usage.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, issues, and architectural notes for a romantic single‑page website build. Tracks project versioning and known UI/animation problems.
